name: Renlandia
description:
Renlandia is a game about a boy who is fleeing from war and having adventures in his own, fictional world.

The game will take around 5 minutes to complete.

Credits:

  • kudriaken - illustrations
  • Andriy Bychkovskyi - the rest

The game was done during United With Ukraine Game Jam. And was created with Unity3d with the help of such external assets:

Graphics

  • RPG Overworld Tileset - https://pita.itch.io/rpg-overworld-tileset
  • Speaker icon by Delapouite

Code

  • Odin inspector
  • 2d Shaders
  • LeanTween

Audio

  • Waves at Baltic Sea shore.wav - https://freesound.org/people/pulswelle/sounds/339517/
  • Empty train moving slowly (recorded inside passenger car) - https://freesound.org/people/avakas/sounds/197124/
  • Rainy weather - https://freesound.org/people/MrAuralization/sounds/241295/
  • Siren.wav - https://freesound.org/people/Jwade722/sounds/534550/
  • Drawing with a pen - https://freesound.org/people/florianreichelt/sounds/407405/
  • Hammer sound4.wav - https://freesound.org/people/OldSchool_/sounds/408763/

Music

  • Kevin MacLeod - Royal Coupling
  • Kevin MacLeod - Canon in D for Two Renaissance Harps
